events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and initial resume review looks promising.
The application has been categorised under Engineering based on keywords such as software engineer and developer present in the resume.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to manage the candidate's progress for the software engineer role.
The recruiter conducted the initial screening call with the candidate to assess technical skills and cultural fit.
The candidate responded enthusiastically to the offer of moving forward with a technical interview.
The technical interview has been scheduled with the engineering panel for next Wednesday at 10 AM.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview demonstrating strong problem-solving and coding skills.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss company culture, benefits, and answer the candidate's questions.
The HR interview was completed; candidate expressed excitement about the company's mission and team.
A formal job offer has been proposed to the candidate including competitive salary and benefits package.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and requested some clarification on the stock options.
The candidate formally accepted the job offer excited to join the engineering team and start contributing.
The onboarding process has started with welcome emails sent and IT setup underway for the new engineer.
The hiring process has been successfully closed as the candidate has joined and completed all onboarding steps.
